meanings.sent1: She wrinkled her nose as she entered the old library, which smelled mustily.
meanings.sent2: The basement was mustily damp after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent3: The dusty old book sat mustily on the shelf, waiting to be read.
meanings.sent4: The memories of the past lingered mustily in the air, reminding her of days gone by.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house was filled with furniture that smelled mustily of neglect.

meanings.sent1: The mustily carpet in the attic made her sneeze.
meanings.sent2: The mustily bread in the pantry had to be thrown away.
meanings.sent3: The mustily cheese in the fridge was forgotten and turned green.
meanings.sent4: The mustily smell of the old books brought back memories of her childhood.
meanings.sent5: The mustily air in the basement made it hard to breathe.
